revision.comment: Robot - Moving category Warp Records albums to [[:Category:Warp (record label) albums]] per [[WP:CFD|CFD]] at [[Wikipedia:Categories for discussion/Log/2011 June 15]].
revision.text:
{{Infobox Album | Name = Body Riddle | Type = [[Album]] | Artist = [[Chris Clark (electronic musician)|Chris Clark]] | Cover = Body Riddle.jpg | Released = October 2, 2006 | Recorded = | Genre = [[Electronic music|Electronic]], [[intelligent dance music|IDM]] | Label = [[Warp Records]] | Producer = [[Chris Clark (electronic musician)|Chris Clark]] | Reviews = * [[Almostcool]] '''80%''' [http://www.almostcool.org/mr/1912/ link] * [[Playboy]] {{Rating|2.5|4}} [http://www.playboy.com/arts-entertainment/reviews/music/clark/ link] * [[Playlouder]] {{Rating|3.5|5}} [http://playlouder.com/review/+body-riddle/ link] * [[Pitchfork Media]] 8.5/10 [http://www.pitchforkmedia.com/article/record_review/39320-body-riddle link]| Last album = ''[[Empty The Bones Of You]]''
(2003) | This album = '''''Body Riddle'''''
(2006) | Next album = ''[[Turning Dragon]]''
(2008) | }} '''''Body Riddle''''' is an [[album]] by [[electronic music|electronic]] musician [[Chris Clark (electronic musician)|Clark]], released on October 2, 2006 on the [[Warp Records]] [[record label|label]] (see [[2006 in music]]).The music video for the song "Ted" was selected by Pitchfork as one of the top music videos of 2007.{{cite web | title = Pitchfork: Staff Lists: Top 50 Music Videos of 2007 | publisher = Pitchfork Media | url = http://pitchfork.com/features/staff-lists/6748-top-50-music-videos-of-2007 | accessdate =2008-07-22}} "Vengeance Drools" was later used in the 2009 short film ''[[Cut (advert)|Cut]]'', promoting the charitable organisation [[Women's Aid]]. ==Track listing== {{tracklist | title1 = Herr Bar | length1 = 3:54 | title2 = Frau Wav | length2 = 4:12 | title3 = Springtime Epigram | length3 = 1:35 | title4 = Herzog | length4 = 4:23 | title5 = Ted | length5 = 2:54 | title6 = Roulette Thrift Run | length6 = 3:22 | title7 = Vengeance Drools | length7 = 3:43 | title8 = Dew on the Mouth | length8 = 1:05 | title9 = Matthew Unburdened | length9 = 5:39 | title10 = Night Knuckles | length10 = 3:49 | title11 = The Autumnal Crush | length11 = 7:27 }} ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.throttleclark.com/bodyriddle/ The entire ''Body Riddle'' album on-line, with track names and music videos.] {{Chris Clark}} [[Category:2006 albums]] [[Category:Chris Clark albums]] [[Category:Warp (record label) albums]] {{2000s-electronic-album-stub}} [[pl:Body Riddle]] [[ru:Body Riddle]]
